summary: This is an email forwarding a Bureau of Prisons press release announcing the death of Jeffrey Epstein on August 10, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The press release states he was found unresponsive in his cell from an apparent suicide and was later pronounced dead at a hospital.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Recipient of the email forwarding the BOP press release about Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The inmate found unresponsive in his cell at MCC New York and later pronounced dead; was under pretrial status for sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein found unresponsive in cell
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell in the Special Housing Unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York at approximately 6:30 a.m. Life-saving measures were initiated, he was transported to a hospital, and was subsequently pronounced dead.

events.title: Epstein arrives at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York under pretrial status after being indicted for sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019, at approximately 6:30 a.m.
The incident was described as an 'apparent suicide' in the BOP press release.
Epstein was transported to a local hospital and pronounced dead by hospital staff.
The FBI is investigating the incident.
Epstein had arrived at MCC New York on July 6, 2019, under pretrial status for charges of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.
